snippet.title: F1st Strike Game Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY NOW AT: https://polydood.itch.io/f1st-strike

[Genre]

"F1st Strike is a turn-based game that combines elements of fighting games combos."

[World Lore]

The game unfolds in a mercenary training camp, where skilled warriors gather to sharpen their abilities before taking on high-stakes missions. In this world, magic power known as Magik Core exists, imbuing its bearer with abilities like ice and lightning. These Magik Cores manifest as enchanted accessories or garments earrings, jackets, and other items

[Gameplay]

To unlock new characters and collectible figures, players must engage in battles against enemy soldiers. Each victory rewards them with experience points (EXP), and upon reaching a set EXP threshold, they earn 3 ECT, the game’s currency. ECT can be used to purchase collectible figures or to recruit additional mercenaries for their roster.

[Music Credit]

Thanks to GLUE WAVES https://booth.pm/en/items/2899444 for the AMAZING JRPG Soundtrack

#retro #roguelike #scifi #arcade #other #action #adventure #rpg

Twitter: https://x.com/IMakeVoxels
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/polydood/
Sketchfab:  sketchfab.com/PolyDood/models
Gamejolt:  https://gamejolt.com/@PolyDood
